ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, I don t mean bard quests in PoG.  I mean the armor quests from dorks, err, dorfs.  You can get the equivilant of PoG dropped armor by doing quests for
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, I don't mean bard quests in PoG. I mean the armor quests from dorks,
err, dorfs. You can get the 'equivilant' of PoG dropped armor by doing
quests for Dwarfs (or giants, perhaps dragons?) Supposedly there are
different ways of getting more or less equivalent items. Questing seems to
be much harder than hunting in PoG. Since I posted, someone mentioned that
they worship Bristlebane so I guess it makes some sense to reward his
followers for hunting in PoG - albeit at the expense of faction loss that
may haunt (or maybe only annoy) you in other parts of the 'world.'

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 2:58 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling


James Schuldes wrote:
> What I dont understand is: why is our loot dropping there?
> Yes, there are quests that offer very similar rewards but have you tried
to
> get them? PoG drops the items <snip>

What quests Jim ? Moonflower has spent 2 days there "Hailing"
everything. The ONLY creature that responds is the Prince and he doesn't
respond no matter what I ask after he asks why I came... This is really
poorly thought out....
